text: This is a list of female scientists from South America. ==Argentina== *Yolanda Ortiz, chemist, environmentalist, former minister of the Environment, d. 2019 ==Brazil== *Rosaly Lopes, geologist and planetary scientist *Alba Zaluar, anthropologist, d. 2019 ==Chile== *Adriana Hoffmann, botanist and environmentalist, d. 2022 ==Ecuador== *Mar√≠a Elsa Viteri, economist, former Minister of Finance ==Related pages== *List of female scientists from Africa *List of women scientists from Asia *List of women scientists from Oceania *List of scientists from Asia *List of scientists from Europe *List of scientists from North America *List of scientists from Oceania *List of scientists from South America Category:Lists of scientists by continent *
title: List of women scientists from South America
